relevant_findings.lymphadenopathy: Palpable lymph nodes (≤1 cm) in posterior cervical, axillary, and inguinal regions
Palpable lymph nodes in right neck (1.5 cm diameter) and left axilla (2 cm diameter), shotty inguinal lymph nodes
relevant_findings.rash: Acneiform rash on trunk and shoulders with hyperpigmented post-inflammatory lesions
relevant_findings.joints: Tender swelling of small joints of hands, small effusions in both knees

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Increasing cough and dyspnea on exertion, worsening fatigue, peri-orbital swelling and erythema

relevant_findings.changed_findings: Increased bilateral subpleural reticular opacities and development of multiple subpleural cystic spaces

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Progression of interstitial lung disease evident
